pr_title: Add a Controller endpoint to return table creation time

timeline.message: Add a Controller endpoint to return table creation time
Make exception generic to catch NPE on null values of tableTypeStr
Make the new API more generic

timeline.bodyText: It occurred to me that it may be better to return a long , in seconds since epoch. Better granularity, less parsing and code on either side (read: easier for automation and scripts)
timeline.author: mcvsubbu

replies.bodyText: I take that back. I think at this stage it is more useful to be able to readily read it on the console. We can leave it at this, but please do add seconds as well.
replies.author: mcvsubbu

timeline.message: Add seconds to the returned creation time
